page.title: Privacy Settings
page.subtitle: Manage your consent preferences and data privacy settings

info.title: About Consent Settings
info.description: You can revoke optional consents at any time. Required consents for service operations cannot be revoked while your account is active.

consents.title: Your Consents
consents.description: Manage your data collection and processing consents in accordance with UU PDP No.27 Tahun 2022.
consents.cannot_revoke: This consent is required for service operations and cannot be revoked while your account is active.

compliance.title: UU PDP Compliance
compliance.description: All consent changes are recorded in the audit trail for compliance with Article 21 of UU PDP No.27 Tahun 2022 (Right to revoke consent).
